original_text: Then he shall go out from you, he and his children with him, and go back to his own clan and return to the possession of his fathers.
korean_text: 그 때에는 그와 그의 자녀가 함께 네게서 떠나 그의 가족과 그의 조상의 기업으로 돌아가게 하라

sentences.original_text: Then he shall go out from you
he and his children with him
and go back to his own clan
and return to the possession of his fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 조상의 기업으로 돌아갈 것이라
